attributes.action: Change the law to give fathers equal rights and access to their children
attributes.additional_details:
Thank you for taking the time to read my petition.

I am the auntie of a beautiful baby boy who has been taken from his home by his mother. My brother is doing all he can to see his son however due the present laws his access is limited and restricted. My brothers ex partner is allowing him access if and when she feels like it . She will not allow more than a few hours a week access and overnight stays are out of the question. Whilst I appreciate this matter has been raised as a concern for many years I urged the law to be changed in the best interest of all children who have a right to a relationship with fathers who love them dearly.

Children have a right the love of both parents and it's time for change.

Again thank you for taking the time to read my petition.
